content.question: Which of the following best describes a claim made in the first paragraph?

choices.label: Hindu rulers had constructed irrigation works to control the Kaveri River.
Wild animals destroyed Madurai’s Hindu temple.
The Kaveri River flooded and destroyed the city of Madurai.
The city of Madurai’s Hindu temple was renowned for its beauty.

content.answer: Hindu rulers had constructed irrigation works to control the Kaveri River.
